        "description": "empty tokens in $ref json-pointer",
        "schema": {
            "definitions": {
                "": {
                    "definitions": {
                        "": { "type": "number" }
                    }
                } 
            },
            "allOf": [
                {
                    "$ref": "#/definitions//definitions/"
                }
            ]
        },
        "tests": [
            {
                "description": "number is valid",
                "data": 1,
                "valid": true
            }
        ]
    }
